title: Electricity: The Power Behind Our World
image_desc: A vibrant image showing a power grid at night, with glowing city lights below, illustrating the widespread use of electricity.
content: - Electricity is the flow of electric charge.
It powers our homes, industries, and transportation.
Understanding electricity is crucial for modern life.
narration: Hello everyone, and welcome! Today, we're going to explore the fascinating world of electricity.  It's something we use every single day, from turning on a light switch to charging our phones, but how much do we really understand about it?  This slide shows just how vital electricity is to our modern world – powering our cities and connecting us all. Let's dive in!
